Text: i received this dvd player free with the purchase of a palm tungsten e from officemax .  now i know why - they are pieces of junk .  less than a month later the screen freezes and eventually shows " no disc . "  this is the second apex dvd player i 've had - and the last .  my first player ( model ad-500a ) went into the trash about 6 months after i bought it .  same story as everybody else when trying to get service from apex - nothing .  pay a few more bucks and get something else - it 'll be worth it in the long run .
